import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import LoadingBox from "../components/LoadingBox"; import MessageBox from "../components/MessageBox"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { modelCars } from "../actions/carActions"; export default function VehicleDetailsForm(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { handleChange, checkoutForm } = props; const carModelList = useSelector((state) => state.carModelList); const {loading, error, carModels } = carModelList; useEffect(() => { dispatch(modelCars()); },[]) return (
You are ready to book. CONTINUE!!!
